sections.Background: Korn is Chianti's partner, and also a skilled assassin, assigned in the assassination division of the Black Organization. He always wears thick glasses and a hat, more tactical and hunting or military/police type outfit as opposed to the more formal ones of certain members, and is never shown without them.
sections.Personality: Even if he is less impatient than Chianti, he enjoys killing, and is disappointed when he does not get the opportunity to, as regretting that he has not been the one firing at Irish. Like most members of the organization, he has a cold personality. However, unlike the other members, he appears to be asocial, rarely interacting with other members unless spoken to. He is always seen frowning and looks robotic. His speech is short and full of pauses, leading some fans to speculate that he may have some sort of speech impediment, is a foreigner with weak Japanese or merely because of his age.
sections.Abilities: He is skilled at sniping. He was able to shoot until 550 yards. It is unknown if he can shoot at 600 yards too, but he was unable to shoot at 650 yards and he is also no match for Akai who can shoot to 700 yards or more to 1300 yards.
sections.Plot overview:
He is at a shooting stand belonging to the otganization, training for the planned murder of a politician. Later, he is present when Gin discusses the time and place of this murder with Kir. Even if he is supposed to participate in the two attempted assassinations against the politician and Kogoro, and is, each time, seen waiting for Gin's order to shoot, he never gets the opportunity to fire.
He is in Chianti's car and tells her he thinks Kir is dead.
When the identity of their boss is finally reached, Conan visualizes Karasuma along with Gin, Vodka, a naked Vermouth, Chianti, and Korn.
He and Chianti are charged by Gin to join the operation of eliminate FBI. Later, he remembers he has seen Camel before and arrive at Umizarujima for searching him. However, they were fooled into thinking to have successfully eliminated Camel. After that, Vermouth shows Camel's photo to him, who remembers he is the photo from Rum send to him two years ago.
sections.The Raven Chaser (Movie: 13): He and Chianti are charged by Gin to burst the tires of Takagi's car, and immediately leave once their mission executed. Later, he is in the helicopter piloted by Vodka, albeit he is not the one to fire at Irish and Conan.
sections.Dimensional Sniper (Movie: 18): He appears in a background shot along with Gin and Chianti after a man at the Bell Tree Tower is killed via sniper, and Conan briefly wonders if they were responsible, since all three are the best snipers in the organization.
sections.The Darkest Nightmare (Movie: 20): He is in a pitch black helicopter as a pilot. Together with Chianti, he received orders from Gin to spy on the Public Security Bureau when Curaçao was transferred to the hospital. He was also able to snipe a British spy with a headshot when Stout was receiving orders on a bus.
sections.Rum: Two years ago, when Rye's cover was blown, Rum send Korn a picture of Camel and said to kill Camel and Rye if seen. During a case, Korn and Chianti directly takes orders from Rum. However, they aren't very serious compared to working with Gin.
sections.Gin: Apparently, Korn takes order from Gin about if he should or shouldn't take a shot.
sections.Vodka: Korn and Vodka seem to get along, though aren't shown together much. They likely respect each other and are both willing to carry out orders given to them by Gin or Rum.
sections.Vermouth: Korn, like Chianti, resents Vermouth, believing she caused the death of Calvados. He wishes to kill Vermouth.
sections.Chianti: Chianti is Korn's partner. They seem to get along well enough. She confides to him that she would like to kill Vermouth because she led Calvados to his death. They are not dating[1], but it's clear that she likes him. Indeed, the animation team added an extra scene where he blushes when Chianti asks him if he wants to ride the ferris wheel, which in Japan is considered a romantic activity for couples.
sections.Calvados: Korn knows Calvados enough to know his feeling for Vermouth and she just uses him. Calvados' death makes both Korn and Chianti furious at Vermouth.
sections.Trivia: - He is always carrying a M24 SWS Sniper Weapon System sniper rifle.
